mapper.sql:
SELECT b.findNo , a.bandName , b.title , b.content , b.writtendate , B.positionNo , CASE WHEN b.positionNo = '1' THEN '보컬' WHEN B.positionNo = '2' THEN '기타' WHEN B.positionNo = '3' THEN '드러머' ELSE '콜라보' END position , b.adsno , CASE WHEN B.adsNo = '1' THEN '맴버' ELSE '콜라보' END ADS ,c.genreName FROM FINDMEMBER B , Band A , genre C WHERE a.bandNo = b.bandNo
AND title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND content LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND userId LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND c.genreNo = b.genre
AND b.adsNo = #{adsNo}
ORDER BY findNo DESC
